index.description: A comma-separated list of index names to delete warmers from (supports wildcards); use `_all` to perform the operation on all indices.

name.description: A comma-separated list of warmer names to delete (supports wildcards); use `_all` to delete all warmers in the specified indices. You must specify a name either in the uri or in the parameters.

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master

name.description: A comma-separated list of warmer names to delete (supports wildcards); use `_all` to delete all warmers in the specified indices. You must specify a name either in the uri or in the parameters.
